Articles.Content:
This mod is great! One thing, the gun loves to overheat, but I just tweaked the config, so it's all good. Also, is it me or am I getting a lot of recoil when I fire this on a tank or something? [EDIT] Nevermind, I fixed it

Edited September 7, 2013 by wolfiie

could you upload your turret please ^__^

I would love you for ever

Cheers, Ryan.
Did you know that this interferes with the extra-planetary launchpads mod? I just learned that through trial and error.
In the true Kerbal spirit!

can you and/or someone else change it so it uses ammo, like a resource called ammunition and there would be amunition boxes? it seems weird that you can use it for infinite thrust by pointing it down and firing it.

can you and/or someone else change it so it uses ammo, like a resource called ammunition and there would be amunition boxes? it seems weird that you can use it for infinite thrust by pointing it down and firing it.

Hey DYJ, can you use a different bullet colour? Because it's pretty annoying when you're trying to make a realistic A-10 and it shoot red lasers :I

Hey DYJ, can you use a different bullet colour? Because it's pretty annoying when you're trying to make a realistic A-10 and it shoot red lasers :I

it should be doabel to do yourself i am doing it now but i am still exprimenting with microsft visual C#. but i have a problem turning it into a .dll i made a post about it here :http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/49575-help-with-Dll-in-visual-express-C-2010

i realy want somme help with it so i can try it.

Can anyone help me bind my joystick to the fire key?

Saitek X52 Pro Flight Control System.
i cant seem to make the gun fire i hit the keyfire button (t) and nothing happens. i tried ctrl+keyfire and nothing happens. help :[

Umm, how do you download this? I know, I seem like an idiot, but I click the link, and t goes to a weird code thingy majig.
Umm, how do you download this? I know, I seem like an idiot, but I click the link, and t goes to a weird code thingy majig. Oh, wait, I got it. Only saw one link.

Robbaz used this on a recent video, and it appears to have sounds enabled - is this true? (at 5:30)

Edited October 13, 2013 by colmo

Wow! Thanks for letting me know he came out with a new video! Though to answer you question, no. The basic download doesn't come with sound, BUT some people have been able to edit it (I don't know how, but I think it is possible).
Why do people on these vids never turn capslock for better control?

Why do people on these vids never turn capslock for better control?

Because a lot of people fly just fine without using fine controls.
Can you send a download link to your LAV? That looks amazing!
